name: Settler
uniques: Founds a new city <by consuming this unit>
Excess Food converted to Production when under construction

name: Warrior
uniques: May upgrade to [Spearman] through ruins-like effects

civilopediaText.text: This is your basic, club-swinging fighter.

name: Great Artist
uniques: Empire enters a [8]-turn Golden Age <by consuming this unit>
Instantly provides [1] [Great Work of Art] <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [Artist]

name: Great Writer
uniques: Can generate a large amount of culture
Instantly provides [1] [Great Work of Writing] <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [Writer]

name: Great Musician
uniques: Instantly provides [1] [Great Work of Music] <by consuming this unit>
Can instantly construct a [Landmark] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [Musician]

name: Great Scientist
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Academy] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [Scientist]

name: Great Merchant
uniques: Can undertake a trade mission with City-State, giving a large sum of gold and [30] Influence
Can instantly construct a [Customs house] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [Merchant]

name: Great Engineer
uniques: Can speed up construction of a building
Can instantly construct a [Manufactory] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Is part of Great Person group [Engineer]

name: Great Prophet
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Holy site] improvement <by consuming this unit> <if it hasn't used other actions yet>
Can Spread Religion <for [8] movement> <[4] times> <after which this unit is consumed>
Removes other religions when spreading religion
May found a religion <by consuming this unit> <if it hasn't used other actions yet>
May enhance a religion <by consuming this unit>  <if it hasn't used other actions yet>
May enter foreign tiles without open borders
Takes your religion over the one in their birth city

name: Great General
uniques: [+15]% Strength bonus for [{Military} {Land}] units within [2] tiles
Can instantly construct a [Citadel] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Can be earned through combat <for [Land] units>

name: Great Admiral
uniques: [+15]% Strength bonus for [{Military} {Water}] units within [2] tiles
Can be earned through combat <for [Water] units>
Can instantly construct a [Dry Dock] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: Archaeologist
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Archaeological Dig] improvement <by consuming this unit>

name: Missionary
uniques: Can Spread Religion <for [4] movement> <[2] times> <after which this unit is consumed>
May enter foreign tiles without open borders, but loses [250] religious strength each turn it ends there
Can be purchased for [200] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion]

name: Inquisitor
uniques: Prevents spreading of religion to the city it is next to
Can remove other religions from cities <for [4] movement> <in [Friendly] tiles> <once> <after which this unit is consumed>
Can be purchased for [200] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is an enhanced religion]

name: SS Booster
uniques: Can be added to [The Spaceship] in the Capital

name: SS Cockpit
uniques: Can be added to [The Spaceship] in the Capital

name: SS Engine
uniques: Can be added to [The Spaceship] in the Capital

name: SS Stasis Chamber
uniques: Can be added to [The Spaceship] in the Capital

name: Scout
uniques: May upgrade to [Archer] through ruins-like effects
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

name: Work Boats
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Kampong Ayer] improvement <by consuming this unit>
May create improvements on water resources
